Test Name: Rapid Plasma Reagin (RPR) Screen with Reflex to Titer
Purpose: To screen for syphilis by detecting antibodies to Treponema pallidum and to quantify antibody levels (titer) when positive.
Container: Serum separator tube (SST) or plain red-top tube
Equipment: RPR test kit with antigen suspension, test cards, test rotator, pipettes, timer, serum separator centrifuge
